hiveArticle.title: Monochrome Monday - Lord Ganesh Idol
hiveArticle.body:
In India, most of the Hindu Homes have Lord Ganesh Idol in front of the house. It was one of those houses where they have a big Idol.

![IMG_0540.JPG](https://img.whaleshares.io/wls-img/codingdefined/f98bc906a703bd85e263f0c10273fcf81a092cd0.jpeg)

Camera: Nokia 6
